title: Performance Media Manager
job_overview:
Pod: Marketing Execution
Reports To: Growth Lead
Type: 0.5 FTE (4 hours/day)
Location: Remote
Core Hours: 3+ hours overlap with 8am–12pm CST
Compensation: Based on experience and campaign ownership

About the Role
You’ll own paid media performance from top to bottom. This includes campaign strategy, audience targeting, A/B testing, creative collaboration, and reporting—all designed to improve ROI.

Key Responsibilities
Strategy & Funnel Planning
- Map objectives across TOF/MOF/BOF
- Build retargeting flows with firmographic/behavioral triggers

Execution & Optimization
- Run ads on Google (Search, Display, YouTube), Meta, LinkedIn, and X
- Test and optimize creative, bidding, copy, and targeting

Analytics & Reporting
- Own ROAS, CTR, CPC, CAC across all platforms
- Deliver monthly campaign wrap-ups with recommendations

Who You Are
- 3–5+ years of paid media experience in B2B or performance-heavy teams
- Google Ads Certified or equivalent experience
- Data-driven with strong instincts around messaging and segments

What You Won’t Be Doing
- Writing long-form content
- Managing social accounts or design work

Why This Role Stands Out
- Strategic input with real budget control
- High-volume campaigns with AI-enhanced testing workflows
- Ownership of pipeline contribution and outcomes

How to Apply
- Share resume and 2–3 campaign dashboards or performance screenshots
- Tell us what worked (or didn’t) and what you learned
